arts.ttl: Empoli determined to take points in Monza
arts.sum: For the first time in their history, Empoli have three players who have scored at least three goals before turning 23 years in a single Serie A season (Lorenzo Colombo 5, Sebastiano Esposito 8 and Jacopo Fazzini 3). Sebastiano Esposito has scored eight goals in the current league season, with seven of these in away games; only one player in the history of Empoli has netted more goals in away matches in a Serie A campaign: Francesco Tavano (eight in 2005/06).

arts.ttl: Preview: Monza vs. Empoli - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Serie A clash between Monza and Empoli, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

Monza pulled off an unexpected 2-1 win against Udinese with their only two shots on target, as Alessandro Nesta's side avoided the unwanted record of the least points obtained in the history of Serie ...
